thread.title: Softmart Expert among Speakers at ScarePoint Cincinnati
thread.title_full: Softmart Expert among Speakers at ScarePoint Cincinnati

title: Softmart Expert among Speakers at ScarePoint Cincinnati
text:
Softmart Expert among Speakers at ScarePoint Cincinnati [October 07, 2015] Tweet 
PHILADELPHIA , Oct. 7, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Gina Montgomery , Vice President of Corporate Strategy for Softmart is one of several talented IT industry professionals presenting at ScarePoint Saturday in Cincinnati on October 10, 2015 . The event, held at the Sharonville Convention Center in Cincinnati, OH , boasts several Microsoft MVP's and other experts speaking on topics such as SharePoint, Azure, and other hot topics around Office 365. 
Montgomery's session, entitled: Office 365 Groups; a Whole New World of Collaboration for Power Users , is directed at end users looking to improve their productivity around team collaboration. Challenges such as central storage, communication, and conflicting schedules can cause delays in collaborative projects and lead to both disorganization and frustration. Employing a network-lik strategy to tackle group projects helps to both empower employees and increase efficiency. During her session, Montgomery will offer up tips, tricks, and more expertise around Office 365 targeted at increasing group productivity. 
Will you be at ScarePoint Saturday Cincinnati this weekend? If so, seek out the Softmart booth team; Dieter Hunter , Gina Montgomery , Ross Ramsdell , or Stephanie Walton to learn how Softmart and Microsoft can bolster your organization's approach to internal networking and collaboration! 
About Softmart 
Softmart is a global supplier of technology solutions for business, government, education and healthcare environments. Softmart provides information technology (IT) solutions, leveraging industry-leading volume license optimization programs and all affiliated licenses support, a broad range of platforms and peripherals, supported by hardware engineer experts, specialized applications and complete end-to-end services. The company is headquartered in Downingtown, PA within the greater Philadelphia area. 
The company's business systems are ISO 9001:2008 certified. 
EEO Employer/Protected Veteran/Disabled
